name: media-pause-timer
description: A GNOME Shell extension that provides a configurable timer to automatically pause media players

scripts.deploy: cd powerful-timer@HBL44.github.com && glib-compile-schemas schemas/ && cd ../ && cp -r powerful-timer@HBL44.github.com/ /home/$USER/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/

author: HBL44
